Row.Text: Liyue Harbor and buildings inside provide the same adjacency bonus, [ICON_TradeRoute] Traderoute capacity, [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_GreatMerchant] GreatMerchantPoints as what same level of buildings inside Commercial Hub should provide. Governor Ganyu now takes charge of a city at once, and enables purcahsing districts in that city.
Civilian units ignore all Movement penalties for crossing rivers, and +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Builders can accelerate progress of districts and projects.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_MLGA_DESCRIPTION}
Buy Traders for free, Units, Buildings, Districts cost 20% less [ICON_Gold] Gold. Cities gain standart yield from incoming trade routes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_MLGA_DESCRIPTION}

A constrution team direct under Yuheng, have mass amount of buildcharges. Can build improvements, routes and railroad, speed up progress of districts and projects, but cost population.[NEWLINE]Will retreat when captured, can move to city.
璃月港和其中的建筑额外获得同级对应的邻接加成、[ICON_TradeRoute] 商路容量、[ICON_Gold] 金币和 [ICON_GreatMerchant] 大商人点数。总督甘雨现在可以立即在任何城市上任，且可在她工作的城市中使用 [ICON_Gold] 金币购买区域。

Replace.Text: 平民单位无视河流的移动力惩罚，并获得2点额外 [ICON_Movement] 移动力，建造者可花费使用次数加速区域和项目的进度。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_MLGA_DESCRIPTION}
可免费购买商人，购买单位、使用 [ICON_Gold] 金币购买时花费-20%。商业中心和港口每有2点邻接加成便为此区域中的建筑+20% [ICON_Gold] 金币，至多生效10点邻接加成。通向本文明城市的商路为目的地城市提供标准产出。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_MLGA_DESCRIPTION}

Row.Text: 一支玉衡星亲自监理的工程队伍，有极大量行动力。能建造改良设施、道路和铁路、加速区域与项目建造，但需要消耗人口组建。[NEWLINE]在遇敌时会撤退，可以在城市间移动。
